verses.name: Acts 20:30
verses.text: Also of your own selves shall men arise, speaking perverse things, to draw away disciples after them.

verses.name: Acts 20:31
verses.text: Therefore watch, and remember, that by the space of three years I ceased not to warn every one night and day with tears.

verses.name: Acts 20:32
verses.text: And now, brethren, I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified.

verses.name: Acts 20:33
verses.text: I have coveted no man’s silver, or gold, or apparel.
